appeng.api.util

Interface IConfigManager


  • public interface IConfigManager
    Used to adjust settings on an object, Obtained via IConfigurableObject

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Enum<?> getSetting(Settings settingName)
      Get Value of a particular setting
      java.util.Set<Settings> getSettings()
      get a list of different settings
      java.lang.Enum<?> putSetting(Settings settingName, java.lang.Enum<?> newValue)
      Change setting
      void readFromNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound src)
      Only works after settings have been registered
      void registerSetting(Settings settingName, java.lang.Enum<?> defaultValue)
      used to initialize the configuration manager, should be called for all settings.
      void writeToNBT(net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound destination)
      write all settings to the NBT Tag so they can be read later.

                     java.lang.Enum<?> defaultValue)
        used to initialize the configuration manager, should be called for all settings.

        settingName - name of setting
        defaultValue - default value of setting

        Change setting
